main: ^Welcome back. How long has it been? 2, 3 years?

c-0: ^Not the best circumstances for your return. Do you remember our Mayor Aaron? Well a few days ago he was found strangled in his bed. The lock on the back door was found smashed in.
^You see, our local election is coming up so I think it may have been one of his political rivals. Darryl, Michael, Aaron and I were all running until his unfortunate passing.
^Why don't you go around and talk to the towns people like last time? I'm sure they will have more information for you.

suggestion: ^Ah yes, I shall do that. Where were you at the time of the murder Jonothan?

c-0: ^Since the coroner said he was killed early in the morning, I would have been at home working in my office.
